content:
# After waiting for the smelting process to complete, it appears that I still have only 5 Copper Plates in my inventory, despite the furnace being operational. 
# This indicates that the Stone Furnace has not produced any additional Copper Plates during the wait.

# Given that the furnace has 9 Copper Ore remaining and is still marked as "WORKING," there may be an issue preventing it from completing the smelting process.

# Let's inspect the Stone Furnace once more to check its status, warnings, and inventory.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory.
current_status = stone_furnace_entity.status  # Get the current status of the Stone Furnace.
current_warnings = stone_furnace_entity.warnings  # Get any warnings from the furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Status: {current_status}")  # Display the current status of the furnace.
print(f"Stone Furnace Warnings: {current_warnings}")  # Display any warnings present in the furnace.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the current state of entities once more.
